items.name: Annihilation's Approach
enchantMods: 80% chance to Avoid being Stunned if you've Killed Recently
explicitMods: Grants Level 20 Approaching Flames Skill
98% increased Armour and Evasion
30% increased Movement Speed
Cannot be Chilled
Cannot be Frozen
Take 10000 Fire Damage per Second while Flame-Touched
Gain Adrenaline when you become Flame-Touched

for the true end follows when the great eye closes.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, reducing their accuracy and making them deal less damage.

socketedItems.typeLine: Anomalous Cast when Damage Taken Support
socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 70 or lower
Supported Skills deal 27% less Damage
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 3272 total Damage from Hits
Supported Skills have 20% increased Skill Effect Duration

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead.
